modName: Night Dwellers Armor - Craftable Sith Assassin Armor
descriptionHtml:
======================== Night Dwellers Armor ========================

A STANDALONE  FEMALE ONLY armor set which is craftable when you have unlocked DAEDRIC smithing. You will find the armor in the misc section except for the gloves which are under daedric smithing

The MALE Hood & Mask have no armor rating just enchantments to keep it balanced

Unique set of light armor which is non game breaking (Look to screenshots for stats) and comes with optional face wrap

[youtube]tJYi2yjamuI[/youtube]



======================== Crafting =============================

Night Dwellers Mask:  2 leather strips, 1 linen wrap
Night Dwellers Hood: 2 leather strips, 2 linen wraps, daedra heart
Night Dwellers Robe:  4 leather strips, 6 linen wraps, daedra heart
Night Dwellers Boots: 2 leather strips, 2 linen wraps, daedra heart
Night Dwellers Gloves: 2 leather strips, 2 ebony ingot, daedra heart 

====================== Installation ==============================================

Drag the data folder into your skyrim directory and activate Night_Dweller_Armor 


====================== Notes ==============================
My second mod on the nexus constructive feedback is appreciated 
I found the inspiration to make this as I\'m a star wars fan and wanted some sith like armor 
for my character, but not everyone likes Starwars so i havnt added any star wars sith insignia
so it can be used by anyone who is after a more authentic fantasy assassin.  



====================== Credits ==============================
bethesda 
RatFinkk
author: RatFinkk
